api_info.description: Enhanced Free Movie & TV Streaming JSON API with TMDB Integration

poster.title: The Avengers
poster.label: Action
poster.description: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!

comments.comment: Amazing superhero team-up! The action sequences are incredible.
Perfect blend of humor and epic battles!

movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.label: Sci-Fi
movies.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

comments.comment: Incredible series! The 80s nostalgia is perfect.

seasons.title: Season 1
seasons.overview: In 1983, the disappearance of a young boy in small-town Indiana leads to a dark mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and a strange little girl.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.overview: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

seasons.title: Season 2
seasons.overview: It's 1984 and the citizens of Hawkins, Indiana are still reeling from the horrors of the Demogorgon and the secrets of Hawkins Lab. Will Byers has been rescued from the Upside Down but a bigger, sinister entity still threatens those who survived.

episodes.title: Chapter One: MADMAX
episodes.overview: As the town preps for Halloween, a high-scoring rival shakes things up in the arcade, and a skeptical Hopper inspects a field of rotting pumpkins.
